prompt:
Nurse: That's good to hear, Patient. Have you gained more than 2 pounds in the past day or 5 pounds in the past week?

Patient: So

Nurse: I'm sorry, could you please confirm what you just said?

Patient: I said no.

Nurse: Thank you for confirming, Patient. Lastly, have you been using more pillows at night to sleep?

Patient: No.

Nurse: I'm sorry, could you please confirm what you just said?

Patient: I said no.

responses.gpt4: My apologies, I may have misheard you earlier. Did you say that you're using more pillows to sleep recently?
responses.our_model: I appreciate you letting me know. Give me a moment to check how I can best help you. Just give me a second to work out the best way I can assist you. Thank you for confirming, Patient. We just performed a simple CHF assessment. It's a good idea to keep track of these symptoms at home every day. I understand that keeping track of symptoms can be a bit complicated. Do you have any questions about how to do so?
